Text: Audit Issue ResponseThe attached file contains the audit issues for which you were identified as the responsible party Please document your responses in the Resolution column and return the file via email by the target date If a target date has already passed please respond no later than Wednesday Please call if you have any questions Thank you Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

FW Power Trading Audit NotificationI will forward each of these per our discussion this morning and will add you to all notifications going forward I have also asked AA for their most updated timeline for the year they were going to make some changes to the one originally presented at the Audit Planning meeting a few weeks ago I will pass it along when I get it Thanks Original Message From Atwood Mechelle Sent Friday May PM To White Stacey Cc Colwell Wes Mendez Nicole Subject Power Trading Audit Notification The Power Trading Audit is scheduled to begin May and is expected to take approximately six to eight weeks to complete The audit will be executed by Arthur Andersen and led by Jennifer Stevenson We will schedule an opening meeting with you the week of May to discuss audit scope and any concerns or suggestions you may have The objective of the audit will be to determine whether procedures and controls exercised over activities are adequate and operating effectively Results of the audit will be discussed with you and other appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the audit closing meeting We will endeavor to conduct this audit in a manner that will minimize interruption of your normal business activities and we look forward to working with you and your personnel Please call me at x if have any questions Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

FW Gas Trading Audit NotificationOriginal Message From Atwood Mechelle Sent Friday May PM To Hall Jr Robert L Gossett Jeffrey Baxter Bryce Cc Colwell Wes Mendez Nicole Subject Gas Trading Audit Notification The Gas Trading Audit is scheduled to begin May and is expected to take approximately two to three months to complete The audit will be executed by Arthur Andersen and led by Kate Agnew We will schedule an opening meeting with you the week of May to discuss audit scope and any concerns or suggestions you may have The objective of the audit will be to determine whether procedures and controls exercised over activities are adequate and operating effectively Results of the audit will be discussed with you and other appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the audit closing meeting We will endeavor to conduct this audit in a manner that will minimize interruption of your normal business activities and we look forward to working with you and your personnel Please call me at x if have any questions Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

FW Financial Operations Audit NotificationOriginal Message From Atwood Mechelle Sent Friday May PM To Hodges Georganne Myers Thomas Killen Faith Ueckert Allen W Cc Colwell Wes Mendez Nicole Subject Financial Operations Audit Notification The Financial Operations Audit is scheduled to begin May and is expected to take approximately one month to complete The audit will be executed by Arthur Andersen and led by Kate Agnew We will schedule an opening meeting with you the week of May to discuss audit scope and any concerns or suggestions you may have The objective of the audit will be to determine whether procedures and controls exercised over activities are adequate and operating effectively Results of the audit will be discussed with you and other appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the audit closing meeting We will endeavor to conduct this audit in a manner that will minimize interruption of your normal business activities and we look forward to working with you and your personnel Please call me at x if have any questions Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

Enron OnLine Audit Notification Cc The EnronOnline Audit is scheduled to begin the week of June and is expected to take approximately two months to complete The audit will be executed by Arthur Andersen and led by Jennifer Stevenson and Russ Bouwhuis We will schedule an opening meeting with you the week of June to discuss audit scope and any concerns or suggestions you may have The objective of the audit will be to determine whether procedures and controls exercised over activities are adequate and operating effectively Results of the audit will be discussed with you and other appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the audit closing meeting We will endeavor to conduct this audit in a manner that will minimize interruption of your normal business activities and we look forward to working with you and your personnel Please call me at x if have any questions Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

Operational Analysis Audit Notification Cc The Operational Analysis review is scheduled to begin the week of June and is expected to take approximately six weeks to complete The audit will be executed by Arthur Andersen and Enron Assurance Services and led by Gillian Boyer and Juan Camarillo We will schedule an opening meeting with you the week of June to discuss audit scope and any concerns or suggestions you may have The objective of the audit will be to determine whether procedures and controls exercised over activities are adequate and operating effectively Results of the audit will be discussed with you and other appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the audit closing meeting We will endeavor to conduct this audit in a manner that will minimize interruption of your normal business activities and we look forward to working with you and your personnel Please call me at x if have any questions Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

FW Final ISO Doc Cc The ISO Meter Audit executed by EAS has been completed and submitted The attached Final Report has been reviewed with key process owners and issues were discussed with appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the Closing Meeting If you have any questions please contact me at ext Thank you Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

Weather Derivatives Audit Report Cc The Weather Derivatives audit executed by Andersen has been completed The attached Final Report has been reviewed with key process owners and issues were discussed with appropriate personnel both during the audit and at the closing meeting Final Reports will also be reviewed in detail with Wes and Sally on a periodic basis EAS will follow up with you regarding implementation of corrective action for High Priority Items If you have any questions please contact me at ext Thank you Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

ISONonPrivilegedpst Hello Chris It was nice to meet you last Friday I wanted to remind you to please reemail me those documents as soon as you get a chance Id like to get through those and have a plan re dates staff etc by midweek this week Please call if you have any questions Thanks Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB

FW ISO Documents Cc po NonPrivilegedpst ChrisScott We went through the following documents with Murray this morning and will be meeting with him again at pm Houston time in his office Please call in if you have time to participate We will be talking through some of the issues in a little more detail Thank you Mechelle Original Message From Lewchuk Ken Sent Tuesday September AM To Atwood Mechelle Subject

RE SQMD AUDITNonPrivilegedpst Chris No problem Just trying to verify yourMurrays schedule We will need to spend a fair amount of time together as we previously discussed I want to ensure you guys are aware of everything and we have thoroughly thought through the issues how they are worded what the corrective actions are etc So we will need time to go through in detail redraft review again etc until we are all confident we have a good product With that in mind you are in Houston the week Labor Day Tue Fri I would guess what about the weeks of and We are still receiving a few last detailswrapup on the draft as you know We could review with you before it is totally completed but the more complete the better Just glancing at my schedule it looks like next week and the week of Labor Day are already quite full so the week of may be best We can jointly make the call when I hear back from you Thanks Original Message From Stokley Chris Sent Wednesday August PM To Atwood Mechelle Subject SQMD AUDIT Mechelle I apologize for not getting back w you in a timelier manner I will see if there is any way we can fit something in for tomorrow If not we could come by some time during Labor Day week when we are back in town Chris

Voice Mail re ISO Report Review and FinalizationNonPrivilegedpst Chris If you havent already please retrieve vmail I left you at your Houston regarding the above and leave me a vmail response Thanks so much Hope you are doing well

FW SQMD AUDITNonPrivilegedpst Ken Please file you received from Jeanette to Chris and myself Chris That sounds good wMurray Just want to let you know that I will be out of the office on Friday and all next work at one of our locations so will you be able to get by Wed or Thursday Thanks Original Message From Stokley Chris Sent Tuesday June AM To Atwood Mechelle Subject SQMD AUDIT Mechelle I should have an answer today on the month that had the greatest number of resubmittals to the ISO What are the dates that the ISO is showing for the greatest UFE inpact Also I will try and set up a time later in the week that Murray Oneil and myself can come by to get an update on the audit Thanks Chris

Bios for FY ISO AuditNonPrivilegedpst We are about to give you a call to discuss but wanted to get this file off to you for submission to the ISO It contains an explanation of our group and each of our Bios as requested Thanks Mechelle Atwood Director Enron Assurance Services Enron Wholesale Services Location EB
